text: Meshulam Dovid Soloveitchik (October 21, 1921 â€“ January 31, 2021) (), also known as Reb Dovid or Rav Dovid; was a Haredi rabbi and rosh yeshiva of one of the branches of the Brisk yeshivas from 1959 until his death. He was born in Brest, Belarus. Soloveitchik died on January 31, 2021 from COVID-19 in Jerusalem, aged 99.Brisk Yeshiva head, Rabbi Meshulam Dovid Soloveitchik, passes away at 99 ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Israeli rabbis Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Jerusalem Category:People from Brest, Belarus
title: Meshulam Dovid Soloveitchik
